website_summaries.verdict: Relays impressive data both on the display and through fitness app, but some wonder whether it's worth the price.
pros: Displays both current weight and weight trends
Weight trends help many users stay on track
Helps correct your stance for most accurate reading
Syncs with impressive number of fitness tracking apps
cons: Some find it challenging to link to apps and devices
Can be slippery on smooth floors

customer_reviews.title: Shattered my Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Scale worked fine since I bought it. Moved it to the other side of the bathroom and set it down on the floor and glass exploded everywhere. I saw this in other reviews and thought it would never happen to me. This literally happened while being repositioned and dropped 1/2 inch onto the floor. Scale works well and syncs well but now it doesn’t do anything because it’s in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: ColJohn

customer_reviews.title: Won’t sync with other apps as promised!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this scale so that I could use it with my Fitbit and MyFitness Pal. It seemed to be capable and the tech support kept stringing me along that I needed to unpair and re-pair the apps before finally telling me that it just wasn’t a feature. Super disappointing that it will only keep data in its own app and only sync with its own trackers. If you want all Nokia products this may work for you. The scale otherwise totally works as it should but I don’t need yet another app.
customer_reviews.author: lzbth

customer_reviews.title: Why so complicated?
customer_reviews.text: After 30+ minutes of trying to get this thing running I found out it didn't have a cord to connect it to my laptop so I could connect the scale to WiFi! They make you download an app, then realize you need to be on a laptop to install wifi on the scale. Then you have to download an .exe then run it in order to make the thing work. The directions were either inaccurate or I was missing the cord to plug the thing in (already irritating if you have a MacBook). I'm buying a regular scale for 1/3 the price and just manually updating my fitness app because it takes WAY less time.
customer_reviews.author: At

customer_reviews.title: it's certainly not easy. Some people on Amazon said it did
customer_reviews.text: Does not integrate with Fitbit! Or if it does, it's certainly not easy. Some people on Amazon said it did, I saw some reviews and threads that said it did, but after getting this thing, Nokia's website even raves about all the apps it works with. I wasted an hour trying to figure it out. Couldn't do it. Nokia's website support was terrible and useless. Most of what Fitbit offered was broad suggestions that were not specific. The whole point of a smart scale was to integrate easily with my current health devices and apps, but this didn't do so.
customer_reviews.author: The Eggplant King

customer_reviews.title: True WIFI Scale at a Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: This scale doesn't require your phone to be nearby when taking a measurement, and reliably records weights for multiple users without fail. It lacks the extraneous features pricier models offer, which I see as a benefit- you're getting the core benefit and not paying twice as much for features you likely don't need. We had a pricier model quit working after two years and I'm not under the illusion that any of these scales are lifetime purchases. With that in mind, this scale maximizes value to get the job well without gimmickry and I'll be happy to get even a few years out of it.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Consistent readings
customer_reviews.text: This looks just like the Withings scale. Nokia bought Withings, so it's not surprising. However, where the Withings scale could give readings that differed by more than a pound when I merely stepped off an back on, the Nokia scale is quite consistent. It wasn't easy to set up. The phone has to be just the right distance from the scale, but it works fine once setup is complete. If I were in a bad mood, I suppose I could have taken off a star, but I'll cut them some slack since the scale works well once you get through the setup.
customer_reviews.author: JerryWithaJ

customer_reviews.title: This scale is beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: This scale is beautiful and functional...It is very precise and tracks my weight with its designated app...The only thing i did notice is that when used on rug the scale measured my weight to be less than is used on hard wood floor...i would recommend to always use on a hard surface for the most accurate measurements. Even with the rug foots installed the same problem occurred.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Govea

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I have used this scale for four months. It seemed to work fine; however, I started weighing myself three times in a row, and it reads three different weights. Extremely aggravating as I am keeping track of my weight loss. Way to much money for an inaccurate scale. I would NOT recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Highly Reccomended
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. I jump on the scale every morning, and without any interaction at all it updates to the cloud. I can then pull up the app to see the chart of my weight. It detects me and my wife as different people and we have never had a mixed up reading (had it 2 months). The app is easy to use (I'm on Android, my wife is iOS)
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Connect To Fitbit Charge 3.
customer_reviews.text: Despite the packaging claims, this will not connect to Fitbit Charge 3 app/device. Researching down the internet rabbit hole, this is a known issue for many people. Frankly it's not worth the trouble to try and make it work via tech support forums with erroneous answers to solve the problem. It's great looking though :) Just doesn't work as described.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dohna

customer_reviews.title: Accurate but WiFi does not Synch
customer_reviews.text: This scale is very accurate compared to my Tanika. However the reason for purchase was the wifi feature and integration into kardia and Google Fit. The scale synchs with the Nokia cloud app, but does not work with any third party app including the two above or Stronglift 5x5. It does not even synch reliably with the Nokia app on my Android phone. Looking for
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Really nice scale that is both Bluetooth and WiFi enabled...
customer_reviews.text: I specifically purchased this scale because it is WiFi and Bluetooth enabled and that's what I wanted. It syncs between the app and scale no problem at all. Setup takes about 5 minutes, maybe 10 if you aren't tech savvy. I use Google Fit and I have the LG Watch sport with Android Wear. I use it at the gym but I don't wear the watch all day every day. Google Fit won't automatically update your weight every day but the steps will sync. I receive recommend this scale for everybody, it's a little more expensive but worth it for the addition of WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: Brotha Dave

customer_reviews.title: Sporadic connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Although I like this scale - sleek, seems accurate etc - I primarily bought it to track weight over time so that I can gauge fluctuations. The app updates sporadically so it does not record daily which is irritating. Since my other devices/apps work fine with Bluetooth and WiFi this seems to be app specific. Rebooting the app doesn't help nor does proximity to scale. I'm glad I got the $59 scale and not the more expensive one since the connectivity issue would make me crazy if I had paid $100+. Good in concept but leaves a bit to be desired in execution.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Mac

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic smart scale
customer_reviews.text: I did some research and decided on the Withings Smart Scale. Really pleased with my purchase and no regrets. It's easy to set up, the app works well. I appreciate the reminders for weigh ins and the goals the app has. It tracks some of the fitness data from the health app as well so you can see it in the Withings app. If you're looking for a smart scale, this is a solid buy. It is loaded with features for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: It even recognizes different people which is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to track your weight loss (or gain if you're so inclined) without lifting a finger this is a must. I just step on it every morning after a shower without even thinking about it. Everything is tracked for me. It even recognizes different people which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Owens

customer_reviews.title: Depends on the Health Mate App, but works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I think it looks great. The setup experience went very well contrary to what I've read (I have iOS and I had already downloaded the Health Mate App and created an account). The scale failed to connect to wifi, but the app informed me that it only uses 2.4 Ghz, so I tried again and it worked. Once it's connected and sharing data, it has just worked.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mustard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use,
customer_reviews.text: Scale accuracy is within 1 lb. IE take 5 or 6 weighs, and the output is up and down by a few 10ths of a lb. I think it does not average long enough before reporting the output. To make this better, it should take say 100 values, then average them over say 20 seconds. I bet it would then always be the same when taking successive weights.
customer_reviews.author: christopher lister

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this inaccurate scale.
customer_reviews.text: I could probably get a different reading every single time. which I didn't notice until too late to return. The "four point" accuracy is nearly impossible to achieve. It takes either 2, 3 or 15 tries. Do NOT buy this. 1 star for getting within 10 pounds accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Good scale and app but slippery feet.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot. Intuitive app, good information and it’s really nice to get the trend of weight and a weather update. I took off a star because of the plastic feet. These really ought to be rubberized to prevent serious injury that could be cause by the scale sliding. My wife stepped on and it nearly went out from under her. I used the included adhesives for the “carpet feet” (which I found to be ineffective on carpet) to essentially stick the scale to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Nokia Smart Scale
customer_reviews.text: I never thought that my favorite parts of this scale are the outside temperature and weather for the day. As it turns out, that information is very handy when deciding what to wear that day. I also like that you step on the scale and it is on, no tapping to wake it up. It was easy to pair with my phone. Overall, very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising!
customer_reviews.text: The scale itself works great but I bought this as an alternative to the stupid expensive fitbit aria scales since this is supposed to sync with the Fitbit app. Turns out it doesn't! Gonna keep the scale but buyer beware... It doesn't have as many partner apps as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Some guy on the Internet

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and stays clean!
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale and the software. It syncs perfectly with the app, has never given me any issues. Even though its black it doesn't show dirt and grime as one would expect. The display is nice and legible, and the added weather forecast is kind of a quirk, but neat!
customer_reviews.author: matthew porter

customer_reviews.title: Great as a simple scale, or a smart scale.
customer_reviews.text: I am mainly just using this as a scale, not with the app. Setting it up was very easy! I feel it is very accurate and repetitive. I try to monitor my two small dogs weight. I have to hold them. It is easy because it always gives the same weight for me - little deviation.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Loiacano

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, syncs fast, but no separate profiles
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Syncs quickly. Unfortunate that there is no way to lock down the profiles. Fiancee refuses to use it because I would/could accidentally see her weight. Support should add the ability to have separate accounts that cannot see the other.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have the Steel HR Sport watch so I didn't need any heart rate monitor in the scale, so this was perfect when it comes to being able to accurately update your weight and BMI in the app without having to key in the info from your own scale. With all the other great features my watch has, makes it worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: What more could you need?
customer_reviews.text: Nice product! Easy set up. Seems very accurate. 0.10 of a pound increments is pretty precise, in my opinion. Nice features. App works easy, and well. Didn't think I needed to know the weather, but it's there now, and it’s kind of nice to know. This is a great “Scale”!
customer_reviews.author: Screen saver!

customer_reviews.title: Works with Fitbit App.
customer_reviews.text: This scale looks very elegant and works well with a variety of fitness tracker apps. Your Withings account allows you to give other apps permission to pull the scale's data/history. The only problem I've encountered with the scale occurred during initial bluetooth pairing. The initial pairing took on the order of a few minutes and several attempts. However, once setup was completed everything worked very well
customer_reviews.author: Owlsly Vestrons

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Initial set up was really easy, and it's worked like a charm since day one. The app sends all the info to my partner apps so I don't need to do anything other than stand on the darn thing. Well... and workout, not eat crap food, not drink so much beer, you know... all the fun things.
customer_reviews.author: Raychee Marie

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, easy to use, keeps you honest
customer_reviews.text: I had this bad habit of weighing myself daily and not logging my weight. Either because I forgot or because I didn't like the number! This scale has made it totally seamless to sync my weight every day with the health apps that need it. Keeps me honest, shows me my BMI, and tells me what the weather will be like before I get dressed. It's become a lovely morning ritual and I miss it when I'm traveling.
customer_reviews.author: HoneyBakedAmbs

customer_reviews.title: The scale stopped syncing after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: There is no product support on their website. You send an email and there is no reply. I never once moved the scale since I put it in my bathroom and it just stopped syncing on 5/28/19. I can't get help from Withings and it won't sync even though I've removed the batteries and tried to re-sync it multiple times. Don't buy this scale. They charge extra money for it "being a smart scale" but it eventually turns into just a regular scale. Sorry I wasted the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon rules

customer_reviews.title: Cheap alternative compared to other smart scales.
customer_reviews.text: All I wanted was weight and this does that. No extra biometrics which are always inaccurate at best anyway. My only complaint is that it doesn't directly sync to Garmin Connect. I understand why it doesn't but it would be nice to have direct sync. The Sync to MFP then from MFP to Garmin Connect works well enough, but I've read it can stop working randomly.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: More Complicated Than It Needs To Be
customer_reviews.text: This one wasn't for me. I had too many issues getting it connected to my network and keeping it that way. It was also not easy to setup for multiple users despite what the product description says. I eventually returned it and switched to a Fitbit Alta 2 scale and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I think it doesn’t show the right weight
customer_reviews.text: I got this scale to replace my previous FitBit Aria that was very slow in reading the weight and eat batteries in a month. This one is much faster and battery is around 95% after 3 months of using. What I don’t like is the accuracy. I’m pregnant and my weight is changing constantly which is also confirmed on my doctor’s scale and my friend’s scale, but this scale doesn’t add as much as other ones. I’m afraid it doesn’t serve the main purpose :(
customer_reviews.author: Dragana Mijalkovic

customer_reviews.title: Good scale, app needs work.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Weighs consistently. (I’ve had other scales that would vary up to five pounds when just stepping off and back on.) Paired easily with my phone, but the setup info wasn’t that clear. The app asks me to enter my goals every time I go into it, after I’ve already entered my goals.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Simply good
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to use. I like how the reading is instant when you step on. Unlike the other ones where you have to tap your foot on it, wait to zero, and then step on it.
customer_reviews.author: Bens

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale, not so great app/setup
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale to replace my Fitbit Aria scale, due to a new implant, i can't use scales that measure bodyfat. This scale is a great replacement and I think I even like it better even though it doesn't do the body fat measuring. The app and web are required for setup and that is a slight downside as the setup instructions suck. Had to google how to setup.. other than this one issue it has been great. I really like the weather displaying on the scale.
customer_reviews.author: TerryT

customer_reviews.title: This does not work with many apps
customer_reviews.text: The scale works great. And I’ve tried every trick that I could looking up but it will not link to my Fitbit and or fitness pal account which was a reason I purchased it in the first place. I essentially have an expensive regular scale.
customer_reviews.author: micheIe

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to setup and use. You step on, line up with the indicators on the screen, and wait until the flashing of the weight finishes and you are done. I usually step off immediately after the weight reading and check the app right after for the BMI changes. I also use a withings watch so all the data flow in the same across all devices so at a glance I can see how I am doing. Overall it is very easy to use, doesn’t need much recharging, and above all the tracking works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great scale at the right price
customer_reviews.text: The Body scale is easy to setup and super easy to use. Integrated perfectly with my WiFi. The Nokia Health Mate application shares data flawlessly with Apple phone apps, my calorie tracker and a free sleep app I use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Buckshot

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: A quality item. Accurate and consistent measurements. Paired without problem to a couple of Moto X4's. Really like the backlit display too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the connectivity to my phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the connectivity to my phone. Had a bit of trouble connecting it to my Iphone 7 plus, but once connected it does what it says it will. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: ashgoi

customer_reviews.title: Best digital scale out there!
customer_reviews.text: This scale was easy to read, easy to install and provides the best intuitive info. that you would need to manage your fitness and weight journey. I have only had it for a few days but it's by far my favorite scale, due to display and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Clay

customer_reviews.title: Most Awesome Scale In History
customer_reviews.text: My Withings scale is a totally awesome device. Its super accurate when i compare it with other scales i use at my doctor's office and my rehab facility
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful tool for weight tracking.
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the app for a while to track exercise, but I wasn’t very reliable at putting in my daily weight measurements. With this scale, I just synced it, and as long as I step on the scale, it gets recorded! I went from once a week to 5 or 6!
customer_reviews.author: christopher m.

customer_reviews.title: Use this every day in my weight reduction journey
customer_reviews.text: Use this every day in my weight reduction journey. Gives so much information on screen. Even wished my a Happy New Year! Amazing Scale! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Scholaire

customer_reviews.title: Great scale—I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be accurate and consistent. I like the app. It helps me remember what the scale says in case I forget. Pairs nicely with apple health app.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Weiandt

customer_reviews.title: Watch it, it slides easily on smooth surfaces.
customer_reviews.text: This scale would have gotten 5-stars if the feet weren’t so slippery and if the carpet feet would have help it be accurate on carpet. Purchased for my elderly parents, can’t have them getting on an inaccurate, slip hazard of a scale. Returned the Body Scale and ordered the Body-Cardio. It may be nearly 3x the price, but it’s worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hedges

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product! Works great! Super integration with my Fitbit bracelet. Nothing to complain about)
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this! ANY Techy would love this! It is very accurate, I love that it records our weight and compatible with My Fitness Pal. Not with Fitbit. I still love it. Makes my morning take simple. I never know what I weigh until I finish my morning routine and log in to my APP.
customer_reviews.author: Charidarose

customer_reviews.title: This scale is really great
customer_reviews.text: Every member of the family can track their weight separately (and privately) and it stores the information in the App. Very easy to use and great for anyone who is trying to lose or maintain their weight.
customer_reviews.author: CMiller

customer_reviews.title: Really a Nightmare. I received my scale and since ...
customer_reviews.text: Really a Nightmare. I received my scale and since i received it it has been damage showing wrong numbers. I contact Nokia but it has been so difficult to ask for the warranty. I am in Colombia and they want me to send them the damage scale and it cost me more than a new scale. DON’T LOSE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Luz A - Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: It works for about an hour. Now everytime I try to check my weight the 2 arrows show up in the botton of screen flashing, I lean in that direction and nothing happened so any weight isn’t recorded. Im gonna return it. :-/
customer_reviews.author: Esteban J Criado

customer_reviews.title: Product lied about features.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to the fact that it calculated your fat. Thinking this would tell me my water weight and fat weight. It does not do that, only calculates your BMI. I do not recommend this product if you are looking for something that will tell you more than just your BMI.
customer_reviews.author: Mr2spyderguy

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: was looking for scale this one had all the features in one package. little hard to set up it took 2 of use. I love it
customer_reviews.author: teddybear

customer_reviews.title: Great scale
customer_reviews.text: Love the scale and the Withings app, very functional and easy to use on an iPhone. Merged into apple health without an issue. Withings is a step above to others on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Battles

customer_reviews.title: I hate it!
customer_reviews.text: Directions were hard to follow....I can't figure out how to use it...would send back but do not have box...I was really hoping it would work
customer_reviews.author: BA Stephens

customer_reviews.title: the Healthy Mate App was very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Nokia Body -BMI Wi-Fi Scale so I can keep a more accurate recording of my weight while I lose more weight. Currently lost 43 lbs with a goal of 25 more pounds, the Healthy Mate App was very easy to set up. Love the fact that I can track my results on a daily basis. Owning the scale for just a few weeks, this scale's accuracy and easy to refernce data will play an important role tracking my weight loss progress. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Oversized paperweight - useless if it doesn't sync with the app - and ...
customer_reviews.text: Oversized paperweight - useless if it doesn't sync with the app - and - of course - while I can sync with the app - the app insists on completing an upgrade before it will function - and - of course - the upgrade hangs in midstream - leaving me with -- an oversized paperweight. I'm returning it - I don't have time or patience to wait for Nokia to fix its problems
customer_reviews.author: potlawyer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t connect to app
customer_reviews.text: I have followed every instruction and suggestion, nothing works. It will not connect to my app. Very disappointed because that was the main thing I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: devoted reader

customer_reviews.title: Loss of measurements
customer_reviews.text: I was using this to track my progress. It looks like device stopped sending data to my phone. And this happened some time ago. Reset button on the back made it "factory reset" and I lost all data. Also I cannot pair the device again with my phone (even after unpairing stale device). Idea is great, execution is half... if you want to use this as a device that works with your apps/devices, it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Tolga

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, seems to be very accurate and once it ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, seems to be very accurate and once it is setup, it provides a very good day to day of your progress. Gives me motivation to get to the gym everyday and continue to work towards optimizing my health. My wife loves it too. Also the weather report after your morning weigh-in is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Thomas Review Person

customer_reviews.title: Great scale at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great scale. Easy to use. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lilbukka

customer_reviews.title: Works great - App is super handy
customer_reviews.text: This scale looks and works great. The app automatically gets the info from the scale after weighing in and MyFitnessPal also syncs the information. Definitely works as advertised. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam D.

customer_reviews.title: Nokia, you should have stuck with this.
customer_reviews.text: Nokia should not have gotten out of the home products business. This is very handy and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Avicenna Sarfaraz

customer_reviews.title: It’s a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use, lots of compatibility with other apps. Great for goal-setting and wonderful classy looking scale.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherS

customer_reviews.title: but I hate the connecting to app process
customer_reviews.text: I never give a one star rating before, but I hate the connecting to app process. I had Nokia watch, the connecting process was annoying. Now the Nokia Body cannot connect at all!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Good scale. I like the Bluetooth feature a lot
customer_reviews.text: Good scale. I like the Bluetooth feature a lot, makes it so much easier to track my weight and progress. Only thing is that I didn't realize that this scale doesn't work with the programs associated with my Nokia watch and app - apparently you have to have the Nokia Body Scale Plus (the more expensive one) to do the weight loss program within the app. Still a good scale though.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Great scales, I love that they connect to your phone and log weight for you. Simple to set up and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Set it up and had it working in about 5 minutes. Only tip: don’t get the black one, dust shows very easily on it.
customer_reviews.author: Zain

customer_reviews.title: Died within 6 months...
customer_reviews.text: As others users reported, this scale did not last long. Have owned it six months and is already dead. I rarely used the device and it never connected properly or permanently to my WiFi or healthmate app.
customer_reviews.author: Ashli Colón

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice that it can detect different users and records automatically
customer_reviews.author: Craigster

customer_reviews.title: decent scale
customer_reviews.text: it gives a weight but takes forever to recognize your profile and sometimes doesn't. If it doesn't recognize your profile it doesn't go to the BMI
customer_reviews.author: Tne bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Customer service - no help - quit working
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working within three months. Called customer service. Their answer was to move scale within 10 feet of router.
customer_reviews.author: M.K. O'Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: The Health Mate app was very easy to set up and pair with the Scale, as well as the Blood Pressure Monitor I also ordered. The Scale is simple to use and transmits the data to the app quickly, which then shares it with the Apple Health app as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to set up and use. I really like the tracking of my weight on the app.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: The Scale That Keeps You Accountable
customer_reviews.text: Super accurate, convenient scale. I love how it pairs with the app to keep record of my weight so I don’t have to!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with this device is that the App has to be turned on before you weigh yourself for that data to be recorded.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The design, white, certainly looks good. But the wifi connection simply does not work. It is substandard and you do not expect that from Nokia. I have a Google WiFi mesh. It is a good network and it works very well with home automation. So it is the scale and nothing else
customer_reviews.author: Karl Werner

customer_reviews.title: Very good to keep track of changes
customer_reviews.text: This scale is great to keep track of weight changes. Another great feature is the capability of identifying multiple people, and recording everyone’s weights individually.
customer_reviews.author: Matheus

customer_reviews.title: It works reliably
customer_reviews.text: Syncs beautifully. I'm connected to a wifi hot spot and it has no issues syncing with My Fitness Pal or Garmin. Well done. Tracks individuals reliably also.
customer_reviews.author: USMCPelto

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this scale, connects to Fitbit and Loseit! nicely. Love that.
customer_reviews.author: thatbookperson

customer_reviews.title: CUSTOMERS BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: CUSTOMERS BEWARE: You need to step exactly on the center or the weight won't register.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it supposed to but burns through batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is a pretty basic scale and it is useful but I have spent more money on batteries than the actual cost of the scale this year. I wish I would have known that before purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be built very well. Display is good and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I thought the whole app/wifi was going to be unnecessary and excessive. I was wrong. It’s great; very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used before and t’s very good, accurate and easy to read
customer_reviews.author: Amancia Pava

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine. for 4 days!
customer_reviews.text: I had just purchased this scale. It worked great for when it was working. 4 days later, it died on me! I replaced batteries, reset it, nada. Customer support has been awful, and I don't think I'm getting a refund. Money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Mabel

customer_reviews.title: Great mobile app and very good integration with Health app
customer_reviews.text: Simple, but powerful. Great mobile app and very good integration with Health app.
customer_reviews.author: M. K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Smart Scale for ANY HOME!
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale. It does exactly what I wanted it for and it helps me keep track of my weight effortlessly. Must have... Plus it was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Devon H.

customer_reviews.title: INACCURATE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great features but, wildly inaccurate in measuring weight. Stepping on and of results in about a 1/2 pound difference, up or down, within seconds of each other. Worthless for intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Family

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great scale, very interactive and accurate, makes tracking weight, BMI progress simple, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: T M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this scale until it decided to freak out and not work. Tried new batteries and resetting without success. It’s all over disappointed the place on weight now
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for my hubby and myself!
customer_reviews.text: Love their App, well made and tracks the data pretty accurately at real time.
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected and with easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. No issues. Syncs with My Fitness Pal and thus to Garmin. Works with my new Comcast router where my old FitBit scale did not.
customer_reviews.author: CKl.

customer_reviews.title: Quick set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up w the Apple health app, only takes a few minutes. We have two users in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Rants

customer_reviews.title: Must have to loose weight
customer_reviews.text: Love how it hooks up to all our iPhones and keeps track of our weights. The kids are even into weighing themself in the morning now...
customer_reviews.author: Lynn D.

customer_reviews.title: glass shattered
customer_reviews.text: It worked great until glass shattered when put on floor on the side. Overall good product if you can take good care of the delicate glass surface.
customer_reviews.author: doubleshark

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, attractive readout, cool features
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic scale. Easy to use. App works great on iPhone. Also shows weather!!
customer_reviews.author: susaninfaye

customer_reviews.title: Easy System
customer_reviews.text: I can track my weight without keeping an annoying diary now. Weather feature is a bit simplified and I often forget to wait for it after weighing myself.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Magloughlin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Sync feature is nice, accuracy is great. Love this scale!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

product_meta.title: Withings Body - Smart Weight & BMI Wi-Fi Digital Scale with smartphone app, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackBody is a Wi-Fi smart scale that features weight (+-0.1kg), BMI, and automatic syncs to the free Health Mate app (iOS8+ and Android 5+), where you can view trends and find extra motivation to reach your goals. Syncs with Apple Watch plus more than 100 top health and fitness apps including Apple Health, Fitbit and Google Fit. Large, easy-on-the-eye graphical display 2.4 x 1.6 inches, 128 x 64 pixels High-contrast lighting.
feature_bullets: #1 bestselling smart scale range in the US
INSTANT WEIGHT INSIGHT - See progress during each weigh-in with weight trend screen to stay motivated and know immediately if you are on the right track with BMI.
HIGHLY COMPATIBLE - this smart scale syncs with Apple Watch plus more than 100 top health and fitness apps including Apple Health, Fitbit and Google Fit.
AUTOMATIC SYNCHRONIZATION - Data from every weigh-in appears automatically via Wi-Fi in the free Health Mate app (iOS8+ and Android 5+).
ACCURATE BY DESIGN - Wi-Fi ensures that your measurement is accurate anywhere in the world, and Position Control Technology guides you into the correct stance so that each weigh-in is precise.
MULTI-USER FRIENDLY - Up to 8 users can weigh themselves and access their personal weight histories, as the scale automatically recognizes who's who.
FOR EVERY STAGE OF LIFE - Keep track of the whole family’s growth with Pregnancy Tracker (healthy weight gain range and obstetrician-reviewed advice) and Baby Mode, to track the youngest members.
NUTRITION TRACKING - Set a weight goal and manage your daily calorie budget.
"ALEXA, ASK WITHINGS" - Now your voice can help you manage your weight with an Alexa Skill that works with Health Mate.
Withings products on Amazon must be “ships from and sold by” Amazon or Withings to be eligible for warranty/replacement by Withings.
